overview: They said he couldn’t make it as a global fashion icon; they were wrong.  They said he couldn’t legally become the world’s richest man; they were wrong.  They said he couldn’t beat all the odds to become London’s first ever YouTuber mayor… to be fair, they got that one bang on.  But now, armed with the rosiest of cheeks & the floppiest of hair, Max Fosh faces his biggest challenge yet – The London Palladium – as he brings you his hilarious & unpredictable debut live show: Zocial Butterfly.  Join Max and friends at his biggest show to date. Let’s #TakeLondonToTheMax.
title: Max Fosh: Zocial Butterfly
